SimplePairedTwoTrack.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004 
00005   SimplePairedTwoTrack.h
00006 
00007   Vincent A. Busam
00008   Dominic Mazzoni
00009 
00010   This abstract class simplifies the implementation of a basic
00011   two track effect where you want the values of both tracks
00012   together.  Inherit from it if your effect doesn't just
00013   modifies a track in place and doesn't care how many samples
00014   it gets at a time.  Your derived class only needs to implement
00015   GetEffectName, GetEffectAction, and ProcessSimplePairedTwoTrack.
00016 
00017 **********************************************************************/
00018 
00019 #ifndef __AUDACITY_EFFECT_SIMPLE_PAIRED_TWO_TRACK__
00020 #define __AUDACITY_EFFECT_SIMPLE_PAIRED_TWO_TRACK__
00021 
00022 #include "Effect.h"
00023 
00024 class WaveTrack;
00025 
00026 // The only purpose for EffectSimplePairedTwoTrackBase is to provide virtual function
00027 //    that EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack and its derived classes can use.  I couldn't
00028 //    figure out how to do it otherwise.
00029 // The unfortunate side effect of this base class is that it doesn't know the data types!
00030 
00031 class EffectSimplePairedTwoTrackBase : public Effect
00032 {
00033 public:
00034    virtual ~EffectSimplePairedTwoTrackBase() {};
00035 
00036     // Override this method to actually process audio
00037     virtual bool ProcessSimplePairedTwoTrack(/*_DataType*/void *bufferLeft, 
00038                                   /*_DataType*/void *bufferRight, // may be 0
00039                                   sampleCount len)
00040                      { return false; };
00041 };
00042 
00043 // This class is a template.  We can do:
00044 
00045 // typedef EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<short int,int16Sample> EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack
00046 
00047 //  and similarly for other types.
00048 
00049 template<class _DataType,sampleFormat _xxxSample>
00050 class EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack:public EffectSimplePairedTwoTrackBase 
00051 {
00052 
00053 public:
00054    // It is not usually necessary to override this method
00055    virtual bool Process();
00056 
00057    // It is necessary to provide an implementation for ProcessSimplePairedTwoTrack.
00058 
00059 protected:
00060    // It is not usually necessary to override this method
00061    virtual bool Init();
00062 
00063    // It is not usually necessary to override this method
00064    virtual bool ProcessTwo( int count, WaveTrack *left, WaveTrack *right,
00065                      sampleCount lstart,
00066                      sampleCount rstart, sampleCount len);
00067 
00068    // It is not usually necessary to override this method
00069    void End();
00070 
00071  protected:  
00072 
00073    // Other useful information
00074 
00075    sampleCount mnBlockSize;   // 0 if no processing done, thus no buffers allocated
00076 
00077    _DataType *mLeftBuffer;
00078    _DataType *mRightBuffer;
00079 
00080    int mnTracks;        // either 1 or 2, set in Init
00081 };
00082 
00083 /**********************************************************************
00084 **********************************************************************/
00085 
00086 #include <math.h>
00087 
00088 #include <wx/defs.h>
00089 #include <wx/msgdlg.h>
00090 
00091 #include "../WaveTrack.h"     /*WAVETRACK*/
00092 
00093 template<class _DataType,sampleFormat _xxxSample>
00094 bool EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<_DataType,_xxxSample>::Init()
00095 {
00096    mnTracks = 1;
00097    mnBlockSize = 0;
00098 
00099    TrackListIterator iter(mTracks);
00100    WaveTrack *left = (WaveTrack*)(iter.First());
00101    if ( left == 0 )
00102      return false;      // we need an existing track
00103 
00104    while(left) {
00105        sampleCount lstart, rstart;
00106        sampleCount llen, rlen;
00107        GetSamples((WaveTrack *)left, &lstart, &llen);
00108      
00109        if (left->GetLinked()) {
00110        mnTracks = 2;
00111          WaveTrack *right = (WaveTrack*)(iter.Next());
00112          GetSamples((WaveTrack *)right, &rstart, &rlen);
00113         
00114          if (llen != rlen || ((WaveTrack *)left)->GetRate() != ((WaveTrack *)right)->GetRate()) {
00115             wxMessageBox(_("Sorry, this effect cannot be performed on stereo tracks where the individual channels of the track do not match."));
00116             return false;
00117        }
00118       }
00119      
00120       left = (WaveTrack*)(iter.Next());
00121    }
00122 
00123    return true;
00124 }
00125 
00126 template<class _DataType,sampleFormat _xxxSample>
00127 bool EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<_DataType,_xxxSample>::Process()
00128 {
00129    this->CopyInputTracks(); // Set up mOutputTracks.
00130    bool bGoodResult = true;
00131 
00132    SelectedTrackListOfKindIterator iter(Track::Wave, mOutputTracks);
00133    int count = 0;
00134    WaveTrack *left = (WaveTrack*)(iter.First());
00135    WaveTrack *right;
00136    while(left) {
00137       sampleCount lstart, rstart;
00138       sampleCount len;
00139       GetSamples((WaveTrack *)left, &lstart, &len);
00140 
00141       right = NULL;
00142       if (left->GetLinked()) {
00143          right = (WaveTrack*)(iter.Next());         
00144          GetSamples((WaveTrack *)right, &rstart, &len);
00145       }
00146 
00147       bGoodResult = ProcessTwo(count,
00148                                  (WaveTrack *)left, 
00149                                  (WaveTrack *)right,
00150                                  lstart, 
00151                                  rstart, 
00152                                  len );
00153       if (!bGoodResult)
00154          break;
00155    
00156       left = (WaveTrack*)(iter.Next());
00157       count++;
00158    }
00159    
00160    this->ReplaceProcessedTracks(bGoodResult); 
00161    return bGoodResult;
00162 }
00163 
00164 template<class _DataType,sampleFormat _xxxSample>
00165 bool EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<_DataType,_xxxSample>::ProcessTwo(int count, 
00166                                                       WaveTrack *left, 
00167                                                       WaveTrack *right,
00168                                                       sampleCount lstart,
00169                                                       sampleCount rstart, 
00170                                                       sampleCount len)
00171 {
00172    if (mnBlockSize == 0) {
00173       mnBlockSize = left->GetMaxBlockSize();
00174 
00175       mLeftBuffer  = new _DataType[mnBlockSize];
00176      if ( mnTracks > 1 )
00177         mRightBuffer = new _DataType[mnBlockSize];
00178      else
00179         mRightBuffer = 0;
00180    }
00181 
00182    // Get both buffers here
00183 
00184    sampleCount originalLen = len;
00185    sampleCount ls = lstart;
00186    sampleCount rs = rstart;
00187    while (len) {
00188       int block = mnBlockSize;
00189       if (block > len)
00190          block = len;
00191 
00192       left->Get((samplePtr)mLeftBuffer, _xxxSample, ls, block);
00193       if (right) {
00194          right->Get((samplePtr)mRightBuffer, _xxxSample, rs, block);
00195       }
00196 
00197      // The derived class process the tracks here
00198       ProcessSimplePairedTwoTrack(mLeftBuffer, mRightBuffer, block);
00199 
00200       left->Set((samplePtr)mLeftBuffer, _xxxSample, ls, block);
00201       
00202       if (right) {
00203          right->Set((samplePtr)mRightBuffer, _xxxSample, rs, block);
00204       }      
00205 
00206       len -= block;
00207       ls += block;
00208       rs += block;
00209       
00210       if (mnTracks > 1) {      
00211          if (TrackGroupProgress(count, (ls-lstart)/(double)originalLen))
00212             break;
00213       }
00214       else {
00215          if (TrackProgress(count, (ls-lstart)/(double)originalLen))
00216             break;
00217       }
00218    }
00219 
00220    return true;
00221 }
00222 
00223 template<class _DataType,sampleFormat _xxxSample>
00224 void EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<_DataType,_xxxSample>::End()
00225 {
00226    if (mnBlockSize) {
00227       delete[]mLeftBuffer;
00228       delete[]mRightBuffer;
00229 
00230    }
00231    mLeftBuffer = NULL;
00232    mRightBuffer = NULL;
00233 }
00234 
00235 #endif
